second_reasoning: Allocating $9 million to Consumer and $11 million to Industrial balances rapid‐cycle innovation with the scale needed for heavier proof‐of‐concept projects. Consumer can run multiple parallel pilots with its funding, while Industrial receives the critical mass required to test comprehensive applications. Tying both allocations to strict stage‐gate milestones and quarterly reviews ensures we can reallocate any underused funds to the division demonstrating the strongest progress.
